summary.span: 包含一组 对象。

span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `profile`配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`部分，以生成一个名为类`ProfileCommon`，该类派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`的小节`profile`配置文件节。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 为每个用户配置文件中，创建此类的实例，你可以通过在代码中访问的各个配置文件值属性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 有关配置文件功能的详细信息添加到[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它是实例的类。The following code example shows how to use the property, which is an instance of the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`clear`指令插入要清除对在更高级的配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用的配置文件的相应节。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 删除当前的配置文件的相应节中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`remove`元素插入在更高级的配置文件中定义的所有元素的配置文件的相应节。This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果该元素定义在当前的配置文件的相应部分中，从配置文件中移除其项。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 要移除的对象必须存在于集合中。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
